author: Staff Reporter
text:
S. Selvakumar, an artist from the city, was seen painting the head of a majestic bull, complete with long horns and garlands adorning its neck, on a red canvas.

“We’ve all heard only of people trying to tame bulls through force but the song p echi pechi , composed by Ilaiyaraajahas the hero trying to tame the bull by singing the composition to it,” he explained, when asked about the inspiration for his painting. Around 100 artists like him converged on Loyola College campus on Saturday to paint for ‘Isaioviyam,’ an event celebrating 1,000 films of Ilayaraja.
title: Bringing Ilaiyaraaja music alive on canvas
